entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
